con:testCase.name: Test : upload multiple attachments to ALL recipient and donor supported attachment sections.
con:testCase.con:description: Verify that multiple attachments can be uploaded to all the recipient and donor supported attachment sections. - recipient sections: PATIENT_PERSONAL, PATIENT_CONTACT, ORGAN_REQUESTS, PATIENT_HEALTH, PATIENT_HLA - donor sections: PATIENT_PERSONAL, PATIENT_CONTACT, ASSESSMENT, PATIENT_HLA, DECLARATION_OF_DEATH
